title: Google\Cloud\ErrorReporting\V1beta1\SourceLocation
name: SourceLocation
description:
Indicates a location in the source code of the service for which errors are reported. functionName must be provided by the application when reporting an error, unless the error report contains a message with a supported exception stack trace. All fields are optional for the later case.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.clouderrorreporting.v1beta1.SourceLocation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.file_path
params.description: The source code filename, which can include a truncated relative path, or a full path from a production machine.

params.name: data.line_number
params.description: 1-based. 0 indicates that the line number is unknown.

params.name: data.function_name
params.description: Human-readable name of a function or method. The value can include optional context like the class or package name. For example, my.package.MyClass.method in case of Java.

methods.name: getFilePath
methods.description:
The source code filename, which can include a truncated relative path, or a full path from a production machine.

Generated from protobuf field string file_path = 1;
